title: Dont know if i'm even getting points.
body: I just won 2 premade games in a row (5 man) but didnt get anything saying I contributed, is there a way I can check and make sure?

replies.body:
There was no official announcement made in regards to this. If we could get a red here to clarify...

I'd say that as long as you were in a match-made game with four other people on your friends list, then you're set to go.
